txt.en: Orkish trebuchets and ballistae can be found at Azgh-buzru.\n\nÓrug has asked you to destroy trebuchets and ballistae at Azgh-buzru.

'[placeholder]! Did Lord Náin send you?

'It is as we feared. Gorgar's forces have erected siege-engines across Azgh-buzru and have begun to set siege to all of Elderslade. As you might expect, Gorgar's weapons are deeply entrenched within his forces. Until their lines are broken, it is likely we shall again find ourselves at a stalemate.

'Find a way through their defences and destroy those siege-engines. When your task is finished, report to me at Drenghól!'
Órug can be found at Drenghól in the War of Three Peaks.\n\nYou have destroyed many trebuchets and ballistae at Azgh-buzru. You should report to Órug at Drenghól.
'You have done well, [placeholder]!\n\n'With fewer siege-engines to slow our advance, we might soon be able to march to the gates of Mount Gundabad!'
Gorgar's forces have erected terrible siege-engines to halt the advance of the Gabil'akkâ at Azgh-buzru.
